skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 30% of the damage inflicted. Will then attack enemies under [Leech] debuffs.
Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff and a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Places a [True Fear] and [Leech] debuffs on all enemies for 2 turns. Grants this Champion an Extra Turn.

Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of stealing all buffs from the target before attacking. Places a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns. Also places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on this Champion for 3 turns. Damage increases by 50% against targets that have no buffs.
Increases Ally ATK in Dungeons by 34%.
